emuInput.TitMainTitle: Volunteer Minute Man Association members, back row from left: Rev. Charles Stanley, Reuben Miller, and James McCoy; front row: Rosa Lee Anderson, Mr. Grice, presenting check to George Pitts, and Lillian Works, posed in Centre Avenue YMCA
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 18, 1962, pg. 5 reads: "For Buggsy - Members of the Volunteer Minute Man Association present a check for $35 to The Courier's George Pitts, for the Charles (Buggsy) Drafts Fund, at the Centre Avenue YMCA. Left to right, back row: The Rev. Charles Stanley, chaplain; Reuben Miller, vice president: James McCoy, coordinator, and Mrs. Lillian Works, chairman, sick committee.  Front row: Mrs. Rosa Lee Anderson, co-chairman, sick committee; Mr. Grice and Mr. Pitts. - Harris Photo."
